pkgmetadata.longdescription: A python lib to parse traffic flow information from pcaps.Homepage : https://github.com/jmhIcoding/flowcontainer.Fix bugs: set the default filter string to be `tcp or udp or gre`. update help information for errors. supports ipv6 parse. fix separator bugs, replace separator from '+' to '`' fix separator bugs, for http payload, the separator char would separate the payload wrongly. support extract the extended protocol name, e.g. TLSv1, TLSv2, IPSEC etc. fix http payload bugs. 2023-03-30: check the version of wireshark, ensure the version is not greater than 4.0.0. 20203-4-16: fix the bugs of separating flow into multi-flows due to the application protocol. v7.1 : 2023-06-05: support load and parse very large pcap file. v7.2 : 2023-07-13: fixed the TCP dupack bugs for TLS/SSL. v7.4 : 2023-10-21: fixed the TCP reassemble bugs.
